# birthLocation

**Instance Property**

The possible locations for newly spawned particles, relative to the emitter shape.

## Declaration

```swift
var birthLocation: SCNParticleBirthLocation { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property defines locations for spawning new particles relative to the geometry specified in the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/emitterShape] property. This property has no effect if the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/emitterShape] property value is `nil`.

For example, if the emitter shape is an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNBox] geometry and the birth location is [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleBirthLocation/vertex], new particles may randomly spawn at any of the eight corners of the box.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleBirthLocation/surface], specifying that new particles spawn at random locations along the surface of the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/emitterShape] geometry. For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleBirthLocation].

## Managing Particle Emission Locations

- **emitterShape**: The shape of the region of space where the system spawns new particles.
- **SCNParticleBirthLocation**: Options for the initial location of each emitted particle, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/birthLocation] property.
- **birthDirection**: The possible initial directions for newly spawned particles, relative to the emitter shape.
- **SCNParticleBirthDirection**: Options for the initial direction of each emitted particle, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/birthDirection] property.
- **emittingDirection**: The initial direction for newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **spreadingAngle**: The range, in degrees, of randomized initial particle directions. Animatable.
